articles.title: Coco Gauff used words and a mirror to persuade herself she could win the French Open - AP News
articles.description: A little bit of self-persuasion went a very long way for Coco Gauff, whose victory at the French Open gave the 21-year-old American a trophy she has long coveted, and a second major title. Gauff defeated top-ranked Aryna Sabalenka 6-7 (5), 6-2, 6-4 to add to …
